full_summary:
### 2024 Dredging – Goodman’s Landing, Manitoba
#### Synopsis
The Government of Canada is soliciting tenders for maintenance dredging services at Goodman’s Landing, Manitoba. The successful bidder will be responsible for dredging the entrance channel to a grade of 215.00m within the specified timelines.

#### Scope of Work
The project involves dredging approximately 1125m³ of material to be disposed of above the high water mark. The contractor must complete the work by March 10, 2024.

#### Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business
This tender is open to all qualified contractors. However, it will be conditionally set aside for Indigenous businesses if two or more Indigenous businesses meet the criteria for the Government of Canada’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) and are listed in the Indigenous Business Directory.

#### Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Number: 30005241
* Tender Closing Date: December 14, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* Contracting Entity: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* Contracting Entity Address: 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, New Brunswick E3C 2M6, Canada
* Contact Person: Marie-France Chrétien, marie-france.chretien@dfo-mpo.gc.ca, (450) 521-4448

#### Request for Tender Documents
Interested contractors must retrieve the draft tender document from the Canada Procurement Intelligence Board (CanPAN) website at the following link:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26180/30005241---rfq-en.pdf (English)

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26180/30005241---rfq-fr.pdf (French)
